name: Beat and Feast
description:
Welcome to Beat & Feast!
Are you ready to have your skills put to the test in the rhythmic realm of Beat & Feast?
Feed your little horned friend by pressing the corresponding arrows as they show on screen. Be sure to feed them lots so that they don't go hungry!
You better be quick, or your adorable little companion will meet a rather gruesome end...
Best of Luck!

Credits -
Developers -
Sam Burton -
Josh Kirby

Artist -
